阿爾沃和西格利的房子

original: Whoa! They killed Grelod! Ha ha ha ha ha!
string: 哇！他們除掉了桂羅！哈哈哈哈哈！

original: Where can I learn more about magic?
string: 我可以在哪裡學習魔法？

original: Magic? That's dangerous. You want to learn that, go to that College in Winterhold. They teach that stuff there.
string: 法術？很危險啊。你想要學，就去冬堡的學院吧。他們專教這類東西。

original: Hey! I know. The Jarl's wizard could teach ya. He's lots closer.
string: 嘿！我知道。領主的法師可以教你。他就在附近。

original: Are you a soldier? One day, I'm going to be a soldier!
string: 你是士兵嗎？總有一天我也會當兵的！

original: Pa says I'm too young to fight in the war, but I can still help by patrolling the town.
string: 爸爸說我太小了，還不能去參加戰鬥，不過我可以幫著巡視城鎮。

original: I wish I was a soldier! They get to travel and stay up late and have fun!
string: 我真希望我能去當兵！他們可以到處旅行，晚上也可以熬夜玩樂！

original: Have you met Lucky? He's my pet goat, and he helps me patrol the town.
string: 你見到來福了嗎？牠是我養的山羊，會跟我一同巡邏城裡。

original: It's a wonderful house, my love. If you don't mind, I'm going to start a small store. Something to do whenever you're on the road.
string: 真是個漂亮的房子啊，親愛的。不介意的話，我想開一家小商店。這樣你走了我還可以有點事情做。

original: You have quite a house. I'm thinking of setting up a small store here. Sell odds and ends.
string: 你的房子真不錯。我想在這裡開一家小商店，賣點雜貨什麼的。

original: Strange house, but strong. Solid. I think I'll open a store. A task to tend to whenever you're away.
string: 古怪的房子，但是很堅固、很耐用。我想我可以開一家商店，你出門時我才有事做。

original: This house of yours is wondrous, at least to these eyes. I've thought about starting a store. Something to do here when you're out.
string: 在我看來你的房子真是太漂亮了。我想我可以開一家商店，這樣你不在的時候我可以有點事情做。

original: This house is huge. I'll be tripping my feet all over this place. Hey, I think I'll start a little business here. Something to do, you know?
string: 房子可真大。我猜會到處摔跤的。嘿，我想在這裡做點小生意。這樣我才不至於閒著，你明白嗎？

original: I've seen bigger houses, but it's yours, so I like it. Now, I think I need something to do if you're ever away, so I'll be opening a store.
string: 雖然我見過更大的房子，但是畢竟這間是你的，所以我還是很喜歡。我想你出門時我可能得找點事情做，所以我打算開一家商店。

original: A good house. You chose well. I don't like sitting still, so I've decided to open a store. Buy and sell whatever is needed.
string: 好房子。你選得不錯。我不想就這麼在家待著，所以我打算開一家商店，做點買賣。

original: Assur had to move away because of the Empire. But we get to stay.
string: 因為帝國的緣故阿蘇爾不得不搬走。可是我們卻得以留下來。

original: The mages don't let us go in the College. They said it's not safe in there.
string: 法師不讓我們進入魔法學院。他們說那裡不安全。

original: Assur says his pa says the College made lots of bad things happen, but the mages I've seen look nice.
string: 阿蘇爾說他爸爸告訴他魔法學院做了許多壞事。但是我見到的法師都還挺和藹的啊。

original: Assur and I are playing a game. Don't tell him where I am!
string: 阿蘇爾和我在玩遊戲呢。別告訴他我在哪！

original: There's not many people left in Winterhold, so I only have Assur to play with, and sometimes he's mean.
string: 冬堡沒剩多少人了，我只能和阿蘇爾一起玩。有時候他很壞。

original: Assur always wants to play "Hunt the Elf" and he makes me be the Elf.
string: 阿蘇爾總是喜歡玩「狩獵精靈」的遊戲，而且每次都要我當精靈。

original: I need you to do something.
What're you lookin' at? I'm not afraid of you, ya know. Even if you are my elder.
string: 你在看什麼？我不怕你，你知道的。就算你是我的長輩也一樣。

original: Boys, girls, dogs, elders - there's nobody I won't fight!
string: 男孩、女孩、狗狗、長輩——沒什麼我不敢打的！

original: I don't fight Lars no more, if that's what you're worried about.
string: 我不和拉斯打架了，如果那是你擔心的事的話。

original: Stupid Lars Battle-Born. I fight him almost every day, but it's not much of a fight, 'cause he don't fight back.
string: 笨蛋拉斯．戰狂。我和他幾乎每天都打架，但其實也不算真正的打架，因為他不還手。

original: We're united, but where should we live? My home is yours, of course.
string: 我們結婚了，但是我們應該住哪呢？當然，我的家就是你的家。

original: I'm a married man! Hey, where should we live? I guess you could always stay with me.
string: 我結婚了！嘿，我們住在哪裡好？你可以搬來跟我住啊。

original: Married. It doesn't feel like I thought it would, but I'm happy. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
string: 結婚了。這與我想像的不大一樣，但還是很高興。我們住哪呢？你可以跟我一起住......。

original: This is the happiest day of my life. Where should we live? My home is your home now, of course.
string: 這是我一生中最快樂的時候了。我們住哪兒？當然，我家也是你家了。

original: We're married. I guess we'll need to decide where we're living, won't we? You can always stay with me.
string: 我們已經結婚了。我想是時候決定我們要住在哪裡了，對吧？你可以一輩子都跟我在一起的。

original: I guess we have our entire lives together, now. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
string: 我想我們一輩子都要在一起了。我們住在哪裡好？你可以一直待在我身邊......

original: We face the world together now. Where should we live? My home is yours.
string: 我們現在要一起過日子了。我們住在哪裡好呢？我家現在也是你家了。

original: Hiya! What's your name? Are you visiting? What do you do?
string: 你好，你叫什麼？你是來遊覽的嗎？你是做什麼的？

original: Papa says I won't see Roggvir any more, but he wouldn't tell me why not.
string: 老爸說我不可能再看到羅吉維爾了，但是他不肯告訴我為什麼。

original: My papa says I'm greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him! He says it means "smart," but my brother says he's wrong.
string: 老爹說我是格瑞-噶爾-瑞-尤斯，就跟他一樣！他說這代表著「智慧」，但是我哥哥說他講錯了。

original: Papa used to say I was greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him. I miss him...
string: 老爹常說我跟他一樣，是個格瑞-噶爾-瑞-尤斯。我很想他。

original: I... I don't want to talk.
I don't have anything to say.
Mother says I shouldn't talk to people...
string: 母親說我不該和別人說話......

original: You're a guest. And father says we have to be polite to guests.
string: 你是客人。父親說對待客人要有禮貌。

original: Mama said I could help with the goats!
string: 媽媽說我可以幫忙照顧山羊！

original: Father says I don't have the knack for reading, but mama says I won't need it to work the farm.
string: 父親說我讀書不得要領，但媽媽說我管理農場不需要會讀書。

original: This is the Old Hroldan Inn. Clean beds and strong drink.
string: 這就是古赫洛登客棧。有著乾淨的床和烈酒。

original: My mother's dead, but I won't close the inn. I've hired Leontius to run things.
string: 我母親死了，但我不會讓旅館關門的。我雇了萊昂提尤斯來經營日常事務。

original: If you drink too much, you're out. No drunks.
string: 如果你喝多了，就得滾出去。這裡謝絕醉漢。

original: Changed the linens myself. They're fresh.
string: 我自己換了床單。還是新的呢。

original: Why is everyone so upset? If there's Forsworn, the Jarl will take care of them, right?
string: 為什麼大家都那麼不安？如果棄誓者來了，領主會解決他們的，對吧？

original: Hope Pavo will be able to go back to his mine soon. Everyone needs a home.
string: 希望帕沃能儘早回到他的礦場，人人都需要有家。

original: What'cha doing in Left Hand? Do you dig up rocks too, like my mom?
string: 你們在左手礦場幹什麼呢？你們難道像我媽一樣也挖石頭？

original: Why do they call it Left Hand Mine? Can the miners use their right hands too?
string: 為什麼要叫左手礦場？礦工們允許用右手嗎？

original: Have you met Torom? He's the best dog in the Reach.
string: 你見過托羅姆了嗎？他是邊塞裡鼻子最靈的人。

original: Hi! I've never seen you around here before. Are you a miner too?
string: 嗨！我以前從沒在這見過你。你也是個礦工嗎？

original: Sondas takes care of me when mom's not around.
string: 媽媽不在時松達斯照顧我。

original: Derkeethus used to take me diving way down deep in the river. I miss him.
string: 德吉圖斯曾帶我去河裡潛水。我很想他。

original: Mom says the Empire is mean, but I don't think they're that bad.
string: 媽媽總說帝國很卑鄙，但我想他們沒那麼壞。

original: The Stormcloaks are named after Ulfric. He's a bad man, but don't tell the soldiers that.
string: 風暴斗篷以烏弗瑞克的名字命名。他是個壞蛋，但別跟士兵們那樣說。

original: I can't believe my mother's gone. Now what'll I do?
string: 真不敢相信我的母親已經過世了。現在我該怎麼辦？

original: I knew it! I knew my father was a hero and he didn't just run away.
string: 我就知道！我就知道我爸爸是個英雄，他沒有一走了之。

original: It's just me and my mother at the mill here. My father is gone. We don't know what happened to him.
string: 只有我和媽媽兩個人在這個木材廠裡。我爸爸不見了，什麼消息也沒有。

original: I hope you're not here to start some trouble. I'll fight you if I have to.
string: 但願你不是來惹事生非的。如有必要，到時我可不會坐以待斃。

original: My mother taught me the millwork trade... you know, which trees to cut and which ones to pass up.
string: 我母親教會了我木材廠的生意......比方說，辨別哪些樹該砍。

original: Someday I'll take over the mill... when I'm old enough.
string: 有一天我會接手木材廠的......等我年紀夠大時。

original: I'm not afraid of anyone. Put a sword in my hand and I could defend this place if I had to!
string: 我不怕任何人。給我一把劍，我就能在必要時保護這個地方！

original: Millwork sure is boring, but at least I don't have to work in a nasty mine.
string: 木材廠工作當然很枯燥，但至少我不用在骯髒的礦坑裡工作。

original: If you beat up my sister Sissel, I won't tell.
string: 如果你打我的妹妹希塞爾，我不會說出去。

original: Are you new around here? You should go to the inn if you need a place to stay.
string: 你新來的嗎？你想找地方休息的話可以去客棧。

original: Sissel thinks she's so special. No way she's more special than me.
string: 希塞爾認為她自己很特別。她當然不如我特別。

original: I'm the older sister, by nearly five minutes. Sissel's barely worthy to walk in my shadow.
string: 我是姐姐，早5分鐘出生。希塞爾連走在我影子裡都不配。

original: I wish I could be an adventurer like you, and go wherever I want.
string: 我希望我能成為像你一樣的冒險家，想去哪裡就去哪裡。

original: I had a dream that there was a good dragon. He was old and gray, but he wasn't scary.
string: 我夢到有一隻善良的龍。牠又老又灰，但不可怕。

original: Most days, I do all I can to stay away from my sister and my father. The beating's the same from either one.
string: 大部分時間，我都在想辦法遠離我姐和我爸。他們都會動手打我。

original: Some day soon I'll stop being afraid. Jouane is teaching me magic. He says I'm real good.
string: 我很快就不會再害怕了。喬安內在教我魔法。他說我很棒。

original: There's a new museum opening up in Dawnstar. The owner is asking me to hand out invitations to travelers.
string: 晨星城有座博物館最近開業。我在替那裡的老闆向過往遊客派發邀請函。

original: Here's a letter from the Jarl's steward. Looks like official business.
string: 這是來自領主總管的信。看來是有關正式的公務。

original: There's a new lady in charge of the Orphanage in Riften. She asked me to hand out these notices to everyone I met.
string: 裂谷城的榮耀堂孤兒院現在換了另一位女士主持。她請我把這則啟事交給所有我遇見的人。

original: Ah, a letter from the Jarl! Moving up in the world, eh?
string: 啊，一封來自領主的信！看來你要往上流社會爬了，是吧？

original: Please, mister. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.
string: 拜託了，先生。你得把我救出去。自從阿文圖斯逃走後，桂羅就變得兇暴異常。我敢肯定，她遲早會殺了我們當中一人。

original: Please, lady. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.
string: 拜託了，女士。妳得把我救出去。自從阿文圖斯逃走後，桂羅就變得兇暴異常。我敢肯定，她遲早會殺了我們當中一人。

original: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.
string: 我以前一直很討厭這裡，不過現在沒那麼糟了。康斯坦斯對我們真的很好。

original: It's too bad the orphanage ain't letting us kids get adopted. I'd be the best son ever.
string: 太可惡了，孤兒院竟然不讓人收留我們這些小孩。我會是個好兒子的。

original: I was named after the sound a lion makes. You know: rrroooaaaarr! Really.
string: 我的名字是以雄獅的吼聲命名的。你知道的，就像「吼啊啊啊！」，真的！

original: I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!
string: 簡直不敢相信！桂羅死了！她真的死了！

original: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, Grelod has been so angry.
string: 我非常希望父母快來接我回去。自從阿文圖斯離開後，桂羅從未消過氣。

original: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, this place has gone mad.
string: 我非常希望父母快來接我回去。自從阿文圖斯離開後，這個地方就陷入瘋狂了。

original: My parents dropped me off here a year ago. But they're coming back to get me. They said so.
string: 我的雙親一年前在這裡拋棄了我。不過他們承諾會回來接我的。他們是這麼說的。

original: You look kind of scary. But nobody is scarier than old Grelod.
string: 你看起來很嚇人。不過沒人會比老妖婆桂羅更恐怖的。

original: Constance Michel says we have to be careful of people we don't know.
string: 康斯坦斯．米切爾說過，碰到不熟悉的人，要處處提防。

original: I'm really afraid of Grelod. When Aventus escaped, she was so mad. I got double the beatings that day.
string: 我真的很怕桂羅。自從阿文圖斯逃走後，她就像發了瘋似的。那天我挨的打是平常的兩倍。

original: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.
string: 殺人可以解決很多問題。我只想知道可行性。

original: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.
string: 阿文圖斯逃走後，桂羅就像發了瘋似的。那天我挨的打是以前的兩倍。不過那樣的事不會再發生了。

original: I hate it here. Grelod the Kind is the meanest person in all of Skyrim.
string: 我討厭這裡。慈祥桂羅是全天際最狠的人了。

original: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.
string: 桂羅死了，一切都好多了。不過，我依然討厭這個地方。

original: I'm strong, and quick, and can do any chore you want. Come on, adopt me. Please?
string: 我既強壯又敏捷，還能幫你打點雜事。拜託了，收養我吧。求求你了，好嗎？

original: When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...
string: 阿文圖斯逃走後，每當他談起要殺了桂羅時......我從沒想過他是認真的......

original: Come to get yourself a kid? You're out of luck. No way Grelod will let any of us get adopted. Especially not since Aventus took off.
string: 你是來領養小孩的嗎？不大可能了。桂羅是絕不會讓我們被領走的。尤其是阿文圖斯逃走之後。

original: Grelod ain't going to like some stranger just hangin' around. Not that I care.
string: 桂羅是不會喜歡陌生人在她面前閒逛的。我倒不在乎。

original: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.
string: 康斯坦斯不太理會孤兒院裡的陌生人。她怕有人會傷害孩子們。我得承認，她這樣倒是挺好的。

original: Why's someone like you want to hang around a place like this?
string: 怎麼會有人像你這樣在這種地方閒蕩呢？

original: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!
I can't believe Grelod is dead. I had no love for the woman, but to be murdered, in cold blood...
string: 不敢相信桂羅已經死了。雖然我對那個女人沒一點好感，不過她被殘忍的殺害了，倒在血泊之中......

original: You really shouldn't be in here.
I'm sorry, but the children aren't up for adoption right now. You should go.
string: 很抱歉，目前無法領養孩子。你走吧。

original: My only concern is for the children. The poor darlings have no one else.
string: 我唯一擔心的就是孩子們。這些可憐的娃兒已經沒有親人了。

original: By the gods, a dragon's been sighted just south of the city, flying around Lost Tongue Overlook.
string: 九聖靈在上，在城的南邊發現了一頭巨龍，在失語眺岩上空盤旋著。

original: You came to visit! It's so much better here with Grelod gone. Thanks to you.
string: 你來看我了！沒有了桂羅以後，這裡好了很多，謝謝你。

original: You're new around here, so I'll go easy on ya. But don't get on my bad side.
string: 你是新來的，所以我不苛求你。但別惹我生氣。

original: Get me mad, and I'll prank ya. And not a little. A lot.
string: 我生氣了可就會捉弄你噢。而且不只是稍微捉弄一下而已。

original: Ah, everybody around here's so serious.
string: 啊，這裡的人都這麼嚴肅。

original: So I like to have a little fun, so what?
string: 所以我想開點玩笑，不錯吧？

original: My friend Dorthe doesn't like my pranking. "You're being mean, Frodnar!" So what if I am?
string: 我朋友朵西可不喜歡被我捉弄。她老是說「你真可惡，弗洛德納！」，但要是我真的很可惡呢？

original: Mother wants me to work at the mill. But I ain't nobody's slave.
string: 母親希望我在伐木場工作，但我可不是奴隸。

original: You gotta have better things to do than talk to me all day...
string: 你整天跟我閒聊還不如做事去......

original: Papa says I'm too friendly with strangers, but you seem all right.
string: 爸爸說我對陌生人太友好了，但你看起來是好人。

original: My father is Alvor, the blacksmith. I'm his assistant. I mean, apprentice.
string: 我父親是鐵匠阿爾沃。我是他的助手，呃......我是指學徒。

original: Some day I'm going to forge my own sword!
string: 有一天我會自己造一把劍的！

original: Papa says I'm not ready for weapons. So I make lots of horseshoes and hobnails.
string: 爸爸說我還沒有能力打造武器。所以我做了很多馬蹄鐵和馬刺。

original: Mama doesn't think I'm girlish enough. But that's just stupid girl talk.
string: 媽媽覺得我太不淑女了，但傻姑娘才想做淑女呢。

original: Papa may have wanted a son, but he got me. He's a lucky man.
string: 也許爸爸想要的是兒子，不過他很幸運，有我就夠了。

original: Ain't nothin' a boy can do that I can't do better.
string: 因為任何男孩子能做的事，我都不比他們做得差。

original: Do you have any more work?
Oh. For some reason I didn't realize you were the same person all the stories were about...
string: 噢，因為某些理由，我沒認出你就是人們在討論的那一位......

original: Well, in any case, you still need to kill those bandits, remember? Then we can discuss you buying property in Falkreath.
string: 好吧，反正無論如何，你都得去殺掉那幫強盜，記住沒？之後我們再來討論關於你在佛克瑞斯置產的事。

original: Ah, it's you. Yes, well, now we'll see if the stories about you are true.
string: 啊，是你啊。是的，嗯，現在我們可以來看看關於你的傳聞到底是不是真的了。

original: There's a group of bandits in my Hold that I... may have had a few discreet dealings with.
string: 在我的領地裡有一群強盜，而我......可能得要用比較慎重的方式處理他們。

original: The cut they were giving me was good at first, but now it's time to clean things up. Go and take care of it.
string: 他們給我的那份只有一開始的時候還行，現在是時候算帳了。去幫我照顧照顧他們。

original: There's that group of bandits that need to be taught a lesson, remember?
string: 有幫強盜還在等著有人去給他們一些教訓，記得嗎？

original: The cut they were giving me was good at first, but now it's time to clean things up. Go and take care of it.
string: 他們給我的那份只有一開始的時候還像話，現在是時候算帳了。去幫我照顧照顧他們。

original: Do you have any work you need done?
string: 你有什麼工作需要幫忙的嗎？

original: You've proven reliable. There's a group of bandits in my Hold that I... may have had a few discreet dealings with.
string: 你已經證明了自己。在我的領地裡有一群強盜，而我......可能得要用比較慎重的方式處理他們。

original: The cut they were giving me was good at first, but now it's time to clean things up. Go and take care of it.
string: 他們給我的那份只有一開始的時候還行，現在是時候算帳了。去幫我照顧照顧他們。

original: I know all the good spots! You don't stand a chance!
string: 我知道所有的藏匿點！你沒有機會！

original: You stand right there and count to 10. No peeking. Ready? Okay go!
string: 你站在這裡數到10。不準偷看。準備好了嗎？好，開始！

original: Actually, I can't stop to play games right now.
string: 其實，我現在不能停下手頭的事來玩遊戲。

original: Figures. You elders are always so boring.
string: 明白了。你們這些老傢伙太無聊了。

original: Hey. You wanna play a game?
It's time for us to part ways.
I will be back at your house if you need me, Thane.
string: 武衛，你要是需要我，我就在你家。

original: I'll keep watch at Lakeview Manor until you return, Thane. Good hunting.
string: 武衛，在你回來前我會持續打理湖景莊園的。

original: I'll return to Windstad Manor and remain on guard, my Thane.
string: 我會返回風城莊園戒備的，武衛。

original: As you command, Thane. I'll guard Heljarchen House until you return.
string: 謹遵吩咐，武衛。我會保衛赫雅根大廳，直到你回來為止。

original: I'll wait for you at the Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath until you need me again, Thane.
string: 我會在佛克瑞斯的領主長屋中等著，直到你再度需要我為止的，武衛。

original: I'll return to Highmoon Hall in Morthal until you need me again, Thane.
string: 我會回到墨索爾的懸月大廳，直到你再次需要我為止的，武衛。

original: As you command, Thane. I'll wait at the White Hall in Dawnstar until you need me again.
string: 謹遵吩咐，武衛。我會在白色會堂等到你再次需要我效勞為止。

original: I need to trade some things with you.
Give me everything you're carrying, dog.
string: 把你帶的東西都給我吧，狗兒。

original: Of course, Thane. How can I be of service?
string: 當然了，武衛。我能為你做些什麼？

original: Do you need something from me, Thane? Or can I carry something for you?
string: 武衛，你需要什麼嗎？或是我能幫你背些什麼？

original: I am sworn to carry your burdens.
string: 我已經宣誓替你分擔一切。

original: How can I serve you, my Thane?
string: 我能為你做些什麼，武衛？

original: You're out in the middle of nowhere, aren't you?
string: 你現在可是身處荒野之中，對吧？

original: Don't have to tell me twice. But then, I'm not the one that buried iron under these mountains.
string: 不需要再次提醒我，另外，我可不是埋在這群山之下的一塊廢鐵。

original: Teach them to stop paying me.
string: 告訴他們別再付我錢了。

original: Here. You deserve a reward for your service.
string: 拿著。你的付出值得有所回報。

original: My blade is yours to command, Thane.

string: 我是站在你這邊的，武衛。

original: As you will, my Thane. I will protect you with my life.
string: 如你所願，武衛。我會用生命保護你。

original: I'll be right here. Be careful now!
I'm yours to command, Thane. I'll wait here until you need me.
string: 聽候差遣，武衛。我會等到你再次需要我效勞為止。

original: Don't be long. My place is by your side.
string: 別去太久。我得一直隨侍左右。

original: I will remain on guard here.
You're awfully... mature for your age.
string: 以你的年紀而言，你真是......成熟。

original: Watch your tongue, stranger. We don't take backtalk in this inn.
string: 說話小心點，陌生人。在這座客棧裡，我們不背後討論別人。

original: You came to visit! It's so much better here with Grelod gone. Thanks to you.
string: 你來看我了！沒有了桂羅以後，這裡好了很多，謝謝你。

original: When I grow up, I'm going to be an assassin. That way I can help lots of children, just like you.
string: 等我長大了，我要當一個刺客。那樣我就能幫助很多的小孩，就像你一樣。

original: Finally. I got stuff to do, ya know.
string: 終於。我有很多事要忙，你懂的。

original: Ten septims tomorrow, baby Battle-Born. Or I'm gonna bloody your nose and your lip.
string: 明天拿十枚金幣來，戰狂家的小孩子，要不我就在你臉上砍幾刀。

original: No! Please! I really don't have any money, Braith! I'll give you ten septims tomorrow. Just don't hit me.
string: 不！求你了！我真的沒錢了，布賴絲！我明天會給你十枚金幣的。別打我了。

original: You'd better give me five septims right now, or I'm going to bloody your nose...
string: 你最好現在就給我五枚金幣，要不然我就打斷你的鼻子......

original: I... I don't have any money.
Yes. Braith bullies me all the time. All the elders think I'm a milk drinker 'cause I can't fight. Nobody understands.
string: 是的。布賴絲總是欺負我。所有的長輩都認為我是個吃奶的懦夫，只因為我不會打架。沒人懂我。

original: If you can get Braith to leave me alone, I'll be your best friend... forever! I'll pay you, too! My whole life's savings - two septims!
string: 如果你能讓布賴絲不再煩我，我將成為你最好的朋友......永遠！我也會付錢給你！我一生的存款......兩枚金幣！

original: You need to stop bullying Lars Battle-Born.
Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Falkreath. Congratulations.
string: 那麼我以領主的名義，任命你為佛克瑞斯領武衛，恭喜。

original: I grant you a personal Housecarl, and this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜你個人侍衛，還有這把從我兵器庫裡拿出來的武器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Falkreath. Congratulations.
string: 那麼我以領主的名義，任命你為佛克瑞斯領武衛，恭喜。

original: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜予你這件兵器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of the Pale. Congratulations.
string: 那麼以領主的名義，我任命你為蒼原領的武衛。恭喜你。

original: I grant you a personal Housecarl, and this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜你個人侍衛，還有這把從我兵器庫裡拿出來的武器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of the Pale. Congratulations.
string: 那麼以領主的名義，我任命你為蒼原領的武衛。恭喜你。

original: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜予你這件兵器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Hjaalmarch. Congratulations.
string: 那麼以領主的名義，我任命你為希雅陲領的武衛。恭喜你。

original: I grant you a personal Housecarl, and this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜你個人侍衛，還有這把從我兵器庫裡拿出來的武器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Hjaalmarch. Congratulations.
string: 那麼以領主的名義，我任命你為希雅陲領的武衛。恭喜你。

original: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
string: 我賜予你這件兵器，作為你府邸的徽章。

original: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
string: 我還要把你的新頭銜通知給我的護衛，我可不想讓他們覺得你也是那些烏合之眾的一員。

original: If there's nothing else, I really must ask you to leave.
string: 如果沒其他事情的話，我得請你離開這裡。

original: Follow me. I need your help.
string: 跟著我。我需要你的幫助。

original: Lead on, Thane. My blade is always yours to command.
string: 請帶路，武衛。我的劍任你差遣。

original: Good. My place is by your side, Thane.
string: 很好。我隨侍你的左右，武衛。

original: Five, four, three, two, one... go!

string: 當然，鬼抓人聽起來很好玩。

original: Five, four, three, two, one... go!

string: 當然，鬼抓人聽起來很好玩。

original: Come back if you want to play tag.
string: 如果你想玩鬼抓人，就回來找我吧。

original: Papa doesn't like when I talk to customers, anyway.
string: 總之，爸爸不喜歡我和顧客聊天。

original: For a stranger, you're not so bad.
string: 就一個陌生人來說，你不算壞。

original: Living with you would be perfect.
string: 和你一起生活將會很完美。

original: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
string: 我們可以住在我在白漫的房子裡。

original: I have a house in Riften.
My house in Markarth would be perfect.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的房子將會很完美。

original: How about my house in Windhelm?
string: 我在風舵城的房子怎麼樣？

original: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
string: 讓我們住在我在獨孤城的房子裡吧。

original: Your old place would suit us just fine.
string: 你的老地方會很適合我們的。
微風閣，我在白漫的房子。
甜蜜灣，我在裂谷城的房子。

original: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
string: 林德爾會堂，我在馬卡斯城的房子。
霜齋，我在風舵城的房子。

original: Very well. I'll meet you there.
All right. I'll see you there.
If that's what you want. I'll see you there, soon.
string: 如果那是你想要的。我們就在那見吧，我很快就會到的。

original: Our new home. I'll see you there!
string: 我們的新家。我們在那見！

original: Then I'll see you at home!
A home for the two of us. I'll meet you there.
string: 一個我們倆的家。我們在那見。

original: It will be our little nest. I'll be waiting for you there.
string: 那將是我們的安樂小窩。我會在那等你的。

original: The two of us, living together. I'll see you at home!
string: 我們兩個，生活在一起。我回家等你！

original: I'll see you at home, then. Don't keep me waiting!
string: 那麼我會在家裡等你。不要讓我一直等！

original: I'll be waiting for you at home, then.
I was just getting settled in. Where are we going?
string: 我剛剛安頓下來。我們要去哪？

original: Oh really? And where were you thinking?
I'll get everything ready and meet you there.
string: 我會把一切準備好並在那和你碰面。

original: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
string: 豪塔別墅，我在獨孤城的家。

original: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
string: 我想我們得搬去別的地方。

original: Someday I'm going to kill a dragon all by myself.
string: 有一天我將親自殺死一頭龍。

original: I'm eleven years old, and I could take you.
string: 我十一歲了，我可不怕你。

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
I'd like to decorate my home.
Very well, I'll make the arrangements. The next time you visit your house, your new furnishings will be in place.
string: 非常好，我這就安排。下次你回家時，你的新傢俱就會安置妥當。

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
Good to see you. Come on in.
Aren't you a sight for sore eyes.
Hello friend. Make yourself at home.
string: 你好朋友，別拘束，像在自己家一樣。

original: I trust you're not planning any trouble. What can I do for you, friend?
string: 我相信你不是來找麻煩的。有什麼事能為你效勞嗎，朋友？

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
I'd like to decorate my home.
I'd like to decorate my home.
Swap my Child's Room with an Enchanting Lab. (<Global=HDRiftenEnchanting> gold)
string: 將我的兒童臥室換成附魔實驗室。（<Global=HDRiftenEnchanting>金幣）

original: Replace my Child's Room with an Alchemy Lab. (<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy> gold)
string: 將我的兒童臥室換成鍊金實驗室。（<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy>金幣）

original: Replace my Child's Room with an Alchemy Lab. (<Global=HDWhiterunAlchemy> gold)
string: 用鍊金實驗室取代兒童臥室。（<Global=HDWhiterunAlchemy>金幣）

original: Money's not going to do you much good after I've killed you.
string: 在我殺了你之後，錢對你而言也沒什麼用了。

original: Hold on. We didn't know it was you we were messing with. Look, we'll let her go and call it even, all right? No need for any more trouble.
string: 等等。我們在找麻煩之前，並不知道目標是你啊。瞧，我們讓她走，然後就兩不相欠了，好嗎？不需要再惹出更多事了。

original: Hold on. We didn't know it was you we were messing with. Look, we'll let him go and call it even, all right? No need for any more trouble.
string: 等等。我們在找麻煩之前，並不知道目標是你啊。瞧，我們讓他走，然後就兩不相欠了，好嗎？不需要再惹出更多事了。

original: Is that how you want to play it, huh? That's fine with me.
string: 你想要這樣玩是不是？告訴你，我根本沒差。

original: Well if you don't have any money, what are we standing here talking about?
string: 如果你沒有錢，那我們幹嘛還站在這邊瞎聊？

original: I knew you'd come for me!
string: 我知道你會為了我而來的！

original: I don't have the money. Can't you just let her go?
string: 我沒有錢。你不能就這樣放了她嗎？

original: Well if you don't have any money, what are we standing here talking about?
string: 如果你沒有錢，那我們幹嘛還站在這邊瞎聊？

original: Well if you don't have any money, what are we standing here talking about?
string: 如果你沒有錢，那我們幹嘛還站在這邊瞎聊？

original: I don't have the money. Can't you just let him go?
string: 我沒有錢。你不能就這樣放了他嗎？

original: How about you just let her go and nobody has to get hurt? (Persuade)
string: 不如這樣吧？你們放她走，就沒人需要受傷了。（說服）

original: You look like the type who'd rather let your girlfriend die than fork over some gold. And people think we're heartless monsters...
string: 看來與其要你付錢，你還寧願眼睜睜看著自己的女友死掉。而我們恰巧又以殘忍著稱......

original: You look like the type who'd rather let your boyfriend die than fork over some gold. And people think we're heartless monsters...
string: 看來與其要你付錢，你還寧願眼睜睜看著自己的男友死掉。而我們恰巧又以殘忍著稱......

original: How about you just let him go and nobody has to get hurt? (Persuade)
string: 不如這樣吧？你們放他走，就沒人需要受傷了。（說服）

original: Here's your money. She'd better be safe. (Give <Global=BYOHHBA2Ransom> gold)
string: 這是你們的錢。她最好不要給我傷到任何一根寒毛。（交出<Global=BYOHHBA2Ransom>金幣）

original: Don't worry, we're not monsters. She's fine. We get the money, you get the girl. Everybody wins, right?
string: 別擔心，我們也不是冷血的野獸。她沒事。只要我們收到了錢，你就可以接那女孩回去。這樣每個人都是贏家，對吧？

original: Don't worry, we're not monsters. He's fine. We get the money, you get the guy. Everybody wins, right?
string: 別擔心，我們也不是冷血的野獸。他沒事。只要我們收到了錢，你就可以接那傢伙回去。這樣每個人都是贏家，對吧？

original: Here's your money. He'd better be safe. (Give <Global=BYOHHBA2Ransom> gold)
string: 這是你們的錢。他最好不要給我傷到任何一根寒毛。（交出<Global=BYOHHBA2Ransom>金幣）
我聽夠了。你們該受死了。

original: Maybe you want to read this first.
string: 也許你會想先讀過這個。

original: What did you do to my wife?
string: 你們對我太太做了什麼？

original: Relax, hero. She's fine. At least she was. The chief liked her so much, she took her back home. Here's a letter for you.
string: 放輕鬆點，大英雄。她很好。至少之前是的。酋長非常中意她，所以把她帶回家去了。這封信是給你的。

original: Relax, hero... he's fine. At least he was. The chief liked him so much, she took him back home. Here's a letter for you.
string: 放輕鬆點，大英雄。他很好。至少之前是的。酋長非常中意他，所以把他帶回家去了。這封信是給妳的。

original: What did you do to my husband?
string: 你們對我丈夫做了什麼？

original: Don't worry, she's on her way. Just be patient for a minute.
string: 別擔心，她已經在路上了。再耐心等會。

original: Don't worry, he's on his way. Just be patient for a minute.
string: 別擔心，他已經在路上了。再耐心等會。

original: You'd better be on your way now.
Well, well. You're a lot smarter than I expected. I hope you brought the gold.
string: 哎呀，哎呀。你比我預期的聰明得多。我希望你把錢帶來了。

original: The chief wanted me to tell you... your girlfriend was real nice to us while you were gone.
string: 酋長要我告訴你......你不在的時候，你的女友對我們真的很好。

original: The chief wanted me to tell you... your boyfriend was real nice to us while you were gone.
string: 酋長要我告訴你......妳不在的時候，你的男友對我們真的很好。

original: You gotta talk to the chief. Rochelle.
string: 你得和我們酋長談談。就是蘿歇爾。

original: Not yet. I'll be back for you.
I just want to get out of here!
I knew you'd come for me!
string: 我就知道你會來找我的！

original: I'm glad to see you! Let's get out of here!
string: 我真高興見到你！讓我們離開這吧！

original: I'll try to hold them off!
You won't enter this house while I live!
string: 只要我還有一口氣在，你就休想進這間屋子裡！

original: You're stupid. All we wanted was money! They're gonna cut his throat now!
string: 妳真笨。我們要的只是錢啊！現在他們將會割斷他的喉嚨了！

original: You're stupid. All we wanted was money! They're gonna cut her throat now!
string: 你真笨。我們要的只是錢啊！現在他們將會割斷她的喉嚨了！

original: Could you take a look in the basement? I've been hearing strange noises down there lately.
string: 你可以去地下室看看嗎？最近我常聽見下面傳來一些奇怪的聲音。

original: I think there's something in the basement. I'm afraid to go down there.
string: 我想有什麼東西在地下室裡。但我不敢下去看。

original: You don't want to be bothering me.
I think you're looking for the chief.
string: 我想你應該是在找酋長吧。

original: I can't wait to get back home.
Have it your way. It isn't worth it. There are easier ways to make money.
string: 隨你便。但那不值得。有很多更簡單的方法可以賺錢的。

original: You don't get a second chance with me.
string: 面對我，你沒有第二次機會的。

original: We could live in Goldenhills Plantation.
string: 我們可以住在金丘農園。

original: We could live in Dead Man's Dread.
string: 我們可以住在亡者之懼號。

original: We could live in Bloodchill Manor.
string: 我們可以住在血寒莊園。

original: We could live in Gallows Hall.
string: 我們可以住在絞架大廳。

original: Oh yes, of course. It's available to you for purchase.
string: 喔，是啊，當然。你有資格可以買下它。
我們可以住在亨德拉海姆。
我們可以住在恩川圖姆茲。

original: Of course. It's available, if you want to buy it.
string: 當然。如果你想買，那正好在賣。

original: We could live in Shadowfoot Sanctum.
string: 我們可以住在影足聖所。

original: We could live in Tundra Homestead.
string: 我們可以住在苔原莊園。

original: Sorry, I can't afford it right now.
I know we don't have much money, but I... I wanted to get you something. It's not much, but...
string: 我知道我們沒有什麼錢，但我......我想給你份禮物。那其實沒什麼，可是......

original: I found something for you. It... sounds like things have been bad lately, so... I hope this cheers you up.
string: 我找到了某樣東西可以送你。聽說......最近事情不太順利，所以......我希望這能讓你打起精神。

original: I got you a present, Mama! I hope you like it!
string: 我找到一樣禮物給妳，媽媽！希望妳喜歡！

original: I got you a present, Papa! I hope you like it!
string: 我找到一樣禮物給你，爸爸！希望你喜歡！

original: I got you a present, Ma! I hope you like it!
string: 我找到一樣禮物給妳，媽！希望妳喜歡！

original: Hey, Pa, I got you something! I hope you like it!
string: 嘿！老爸！我有樣東西給你！希望你喜歡！

original: Hey, I got you something. Hope you like it!
string: 嘿！我有樣東西要給你。希望你會喜歡！

original: Look what I found! Here, take it!
string: 看看我找到什麼！來，拿去！

original: Could you give me an allowance?
Could I get a few gold to spend? Please?
string: 可以給我幾枚金幣零用嗎？拜託啦？

original: I'd like you to make some improvements to the house.
I need a steward for my house. Are you interested?
string: 我家裡需要一位總管。你有興趣嗎？

original: I'll have to think about it.
Of course. I didn't mean to meddle in your private affairs.
string: 當然。我不是有意要干涉你的隱私。

original: I'd be honored to have you as my steward.
string: 有你這麼一位管家是我的榮幸。

original: Thank you! Let me know if you have anything you need from me. I'm at your service.
string: 謝謝！如果你需要什麼，請跟我說。我會盡力為你服務。

original: A fine steading like this needs a good steward. I'd be happy to take on that position, if you'd like.
string: 像這麼一塊好家園，需要一位稱職的總管。如果你願意的話，我很樂意擔任那個職務。

original: I'll have to think about it.
I'm a bit short of money right now. (<Global=BYOHHPCost> gold)
Ah, I see. Well, it's possible that the property will still be available when you amass the necessary funds.
string: 啊，我明白了。等你湊齊了所需的資金，你還是可以買下這塊土地。

original: You won't regret it. Here's the title to your steading.
string: 你不會後悔的。這是你的土地所有權狀。

original: Follow the road east from Falkreath, then north at the crossroads. Turn left just past Pinewatch.
string: 從佛克瑞斯沿著路往東走，遇到路口時往北，然後一過松木哨塔就往左轉。

original: I'd like to purchase a house.
Ah, excellent. The Jarl was hoping you would be interested.
string: 啊，太好了。領主一直希望你有興趣。

original: It's a fine property. Well-watered, plentiful stands of timber, beautiful view.
string: 那是塊很不錯的土地。水源充足、草木林立，而且景色優美。

original: I got your letter about the land for sale. Is it still available?
string: 我收到你寄的那封有關出售土地的信了。它還在賣嗎？

original: There's no house available, but I could sell you a fine piece of land where you could build your own house.
string: 現在沒有房子可以賣給你，不過我可以賣一塊好地給你，讓你自己蓋房子。

original: Yes. It's a fine property. Well-watered, plentiful stands of timber, beautiful view.
string: 那是塊很不錯的土地。水源充足、草木林立，而且景色優美。

original: Is that land you mentioned still available?
string: 你之前提的那塊土地還在賣嗎？

original: Can I just cut the lumber myself?
I'd like to buy some lumber.
Braith is a big meanie. She keeps telling Lars 'n me what to do. I don't wanna play with her anymore.
string: 布賴絲壞透了。她一直指使我和拉斯。我不想再和她玩了。

original: I played with Lucia in the park today. I feel sorry for her.
string: 我今天和路西亞在公園裡一起玩了。我替她覺得難過。

original: Lars is such a milk-drinker. He can't even stand up to a girl.
string: 拉斯真是個懦夫。他甚至不敢反抗一個女孩子。

original: Dragonsreach is so cool! All the kids there are mean, though.
string: 龍臨堡實在太酷了！不過那裡每個孩子都很壞就是了。

original: There are lots of scary people here, Mama. Promise you'll keep me safe?
string: 媽媽，這裡有好多嚇人的人。答應我，妳會保護我好嗎？

original: Mister Brynjolf gave me an apple, Papa! He seems nice.
string: 布林喬夫先生給了我一顆蘋果呢，爸爸！他看起來人真好。

original: Maramal said I could visit the temple whenever I wanted.
string: 媽媽說只要我想，隨時都可以去神殿裡看看。

original: Mister Brynjolf said he could teach me a lot of neat things when I'm older.
string: 布林喬夫先生說等我再長大一點，他可以教我很多靈巧的技術。

original: I wanna go swimming, but the guards keep yelling at me. The canal's not that dirty...
string: 我想要去游泳，可是守衛不停地對我大吼大叫。明明運河又沒有很髒......

original: Banning said I could come play with his dogs. I want a dog.
string: 班寧說我可以去找他的狗玩。我也想要養狗。

original: I climbed all the way up to the temple, but they said I wasn't old enough to get in. They're just mean.
string: 我一路爬上去到了神殿，他們才說我年紀太小不能進去。他們簡直壞透了。

original: I hate Markarth. There's nowhere to play! It's all just rocks. Rocks rocks rocks.
string: 我恨馬卡斯城。這裡根本沒地方玩！除了石頭，還是石頭。

original: Aicantar let me see his museum. It's really nice.
string: 愛坎塔讓我參觀他的博物館。那真是個很棒的地方。

original: Do you think I could be a Bard? I really like singing.
string: 你覺得我能成為一位吟遊詩人嗎？我真的很喜歡唱歌耶。

original: When I grow up, I wanna join the Legion!
string: 等我長大，我要加入帝國軍團！

original: Grimvar said a boy used to live in that abandoned house, all alone, 'til the Dark Brotherhood came 'n got him. Scary, huh?
string: 格瑞姆瓦說之前有個男孩自己一個人住在廢屋裡，直到有天黑暗兄弟會的人來把他抓走。很嚇人吧？

original: I'm gonna join the Stormcloaks. They're the best!
string: 我要加入風暴斗篷！他們是最棒的！

original: The Argonians at the docks say they can breathe underwater. I wish I could do that...
string: 碼頭的亞龍人說他們可以在水面下呼吸。我希望我也可以......

original: Rolff says I shouldn't go to the Grey Quarter anymore. He said it's not safe there.
string: 羅爾夫說我不該再去灰民區了。他說那裡不安全。

original: I saw a Thalmor the other day. He was really scary!
string: 有天我看到一個梭莫成員。他真的很嚇人呢！

original: The Palace looks so pretty. I wish they'd let me inside...
string: 那城堡真是太美了。真希望他們讓我進去。

original: Ma took me to the market. We saw this huge fish! I bet even you couldn't lift it!
string: 媽帶我去了市場。我們看到這麼大的一隻魚！我敢打賭你根本舉不動。

original: Mama took me to the market! There were lot of pies and cakes there. She said she'd show me how to bake one!
string: 媽媽帶我去了市場！那裡有好多派和蛋糕。她說她會教我怎麼自己烤。

original: Pa said he'd take me hunting soon. I can't wait! I bet I'll bring down a mammoth!
string: 爸說過陣子他會帶我去打獵。我等不及了！我敢說我一定可以放倒一隻長毛象！

original: Papa said we could go fishing! With my help, I'm sure he'll catch something this time!
string: 爸爸說我們可以去釣魚！有我幫忙，這次他一定可以釣到什麼的！

original: This place is scary. There are monsters in the swamp. I just know it!
string: 這地方真嚇人。有怪獸躲在沼澤裡。不為什麼，我就是知道！

original: Look at all the snow! I want to go sledding! Or skating!
string: 看看這些雪！我想去滑雪橇！或是溜冰！

original: It's so c-c-cold here! If I play outside for too long, I'm going to freeze solid!
string: 這、這裡好冷喔！如果我在外面玩太久，我會凍僵的！

original: Did you really build this house all by yourself? Wow!
string: 你真的是靠自己蓋起這棟房子的嗎？哇！

original: I went fishing at the lake. I almost caught something!
string: 我去湖邊釣魚，差一點就釣到了呢！

original: I like living here. The lake is so pretty.
string: 我喜歡住在這裡。那座湖好美唷。

original: I like it here. The tree in the park is so pretty!
string: 我喜歡這裡。公園裡的樹好漂亮！

original: That big tree in the park looks so sad... I feel sorry for it.
string: 公園裡的大樹看起來好傷心......讓我也替它覺得難過。

original: All right, I'll see you there!
Aww... come on. Just a few more minutes? Please?
string: 喔......拜託，再幾分鐘？拜託啦？

original: But it's not even dark yet!
What do you want to play?
Sure! What do you want to play?
Wha... seriously? No way... With this, I... I could buy everything in the market! Wow! Thanks!
string: 哇喔......真的嗎？不行......有了這個，我在市場裡想買什麼就能買什麼！哇！謝謝！

original: Wha? But.... but it's dark out. Is it... really okay?
string: 什麼？可是......可是外面天黑了耶。那樣......真的沒問題嗎？

original: You got me a present? Wow, thanks, Ma!
string: 妳有禮物要給我？哇！謝謝！媽！

original: You got me a present? Wow, thanks, Pa!
string: 你有禮物要給我？哇！謝謝！爸！

original: What is it? What is it?
You got me a present? Really?
Wow, really? What'd you get me?
string: 哇，真的嗎？你帶了什麼給我？

original: Oh, fine. So many guards on the street here I hardly have to worry.
string: 喔，好啊。街上這麼多守衛，我沒什麼好擔心的。

original: Hmph. This city's crawling with filth. It's everything I can do keep the children safe.
string: 哼，這城市藏汙納垢的。我給想盡辦法確保孩子的安全。

original: You tell me. Between the Forsworn and the mines, Markarth is no place to raise a child.
string: 你倒是告訴我啊。馬卡斯城夾在棄誓者和礦坑之間，怎麼會是一個適合養小孩的地方？

original: Oh, fine, if you want to bring up little pickpockets. This place is a terrible influence on a child.
string: 喔，好啊，如果你想養出些小扒手的話。這地方對孩子的影響太糟了。

original: As well as can be expected. Dear, this house would work for the two of us, but with children? We need to find a bigger place.
string: 想也知道。親愛的，這房子給我們兩個住還可以，但如果要和孩子一起住，我們就得找個更大的地方了。

original: Fine, when we're not fending off attacks by wolves. Or bears. Or giant spiders. Honestly, what were you thinking, sending us out here?
string: 很好，等我們不需要擊退狼群、熊群或是大蜘蛛時吧。老實說，你把我們送到這裡來到底想做什麼？

original: Very well, love. This is a beautiful house, and Solitude is so safe, so diverse. It's a wonderful place to raise a child.
string: 很好，親愛的。這是棟美麗的房子，而獨孤城是這麼地安全、這麼地多采多姿。這裡是個養育孩子的好地方。

original: Well, love, very well. There's so much history in this city, so many things we can do here.
string: 很好，親愛的。非常好。這座城市有這麼久遠的歷史，我們在這有非常多的事情可以做。

original: All right. I do worry, though, no matter how many times the guards say Markarth is safe.
string: 很好。但不管守衛們說過幾次馬卡斯城很安全，我還是很擔心，

original: Just fine, love. The weather here is wonderful, perfect for playing outdoors.
string: 很好啊，親愛的。這裡的氣候是這麼的好，非常適合在戶外玩耍。

original: Just fine. Whiterun is a lovely city, and there are so many other children here- they all love playing together.
string: 很好。白漫是個美麗的城市，而且又有很多其他家的孩子。他們都喜歡一起玩耍。

original: Fine, love. I think the fresh air does wonders for all of us, and this house... it's just perfect.
string: 很好啊，親愛的。這裡的空氣是這麼的好，這地方真的很棒。

original: Fine, just fine. This house is perfect for a growing family.
string: 好，很好。這棟房子非常適合人數正在成長中的家庭。

original: Great. There's so much history here in Windhelm, so much to learn about our ancestors and our land.
string: 好極了。風舵城這裡有非常多的歷史，可以學習很多關於我們的祖先與土地的事情。

original: Honestly, I'm a little worried. Markarth is nice enough, but... I wonder if it's really safe for children.
string: 老實說，我有點擔心。馬卡斯城很好，但是......我懷疑對孩子來說這裡是否安全。

original: Well enough. Riften's a tough city, but... it's a tough world. Kid has to learn to stand up for themselves sometime.
string: 還不錯。裂谷城的環境不怎麼樣，不過......畢竟世道就是這麼險惡。孩子有時必須學著捍衛自己。

original: Couldn't be better. Whiterun is perfect for a child- great weather, plenty of space, friends to play with. What more could you want?
string: 白漫對孩子而言好得不能再好了——宜人的天氣、寬廣的空間，還有許多玩伴。你還能奢求什麼呢？

original: Fine, fine. Living out here on our own will take some getting used to, but I think it'll be good for us.
string: 好啦，好啦。靠我們自己在這生活可能要想辦法習慣，但那對我們而言應該會是好的。

original: Meh. Children get soft when they're coddled in a place like this.
string: 嘖。孩子窩在這種地方，會變得懦弱的。

original: Good. This is a city that respects strength. Honors it. A good lesson for children to learn.
string: 很好。這座城市尊重且推崇力量。對孩子而言，這是很好的教誨。

original: Fine, fine. This city's not safe, but... that's good. Keeps a kid on edge, alert. Could keep 'em alive when they grow up.
string: 好吧，好吧。這座城市並不安全，不過......這就是它的優點。讓孩子活在危險中，隨時保持警覺，可以讓他們長大後懂得如何活下去。

original: Hmph. This city's crawling with thieves. Cowards. Kid could learn some bad habits here.
string: 嗯。這座城市充斥著盜賊和懦夫。孩子在這可能會學會什麼壞習慣。

original: Fine, fine. Plenty of kids here to play and spar with. Plenty of trades to learn. It's a good place to raise a child.
string: 好啦，好啦。這裡有很多孩子可以一起玩，也有許多買賣可供學習。這是個養育孩子的好地方。

original: Better than ever. Nothing like living off the land to teach you how to fight, how to survive. We'll have a little warrior on our hands in no time.
string: 比之前的都要來得好。沒有比在荒野生活更能教人學會如何戰鬥、如何生存。我們家很快就會有一位小戰士了。

original: Do you... do you think I could keep him for you?
string: 你......你真的覺得我可以代你收著它嗎？

original: Do you... do you think I could keep him?
string: 你......你真的覺得我可以收著它嗎？

original: Could I... could I keep him? Please?
string: 我......我可以留著牠嗎？拜託啦？

original: It's time for us to move.

string: 老實說呢，我們還是留在這裡吧。

original: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
string: 豪塔別墅，我在獨孤城的房子。

original: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
string: 林德爾會堂，我在馬卡斯城的房子。
甜蜜灣，我在裂谷城的房子。
微風閣，我在白漫的房子。
霜齋，我在風舵城的房子。

original: Okay! You stand right there and count to 10... no peeking! Ready? ...Go!
string: 好！你站在那裡數到十......不准偷看！準備好了沒？......開始！

original: Sorry, no, I've changed my mind.
string: 對不起，不了，我改變主意了。
當然，你想怎樣都行。1000金幣呢？
當然，你想怎樣都行。1000金幣呢？

original: My... my parents died, and... and now I'm all alone...
string: 我......我的父母過世了，現在......我是孤單一個人了......

original: Mama died, and now I'm... I'm all alone...
string: 媽媽死了，現在......只剩我一個了......

original: My papa died and... and I'm all alone...
string: 我爸爸死了，現在我......我是孤單一人了......

original: My... my parents died, not too long ago. I... I don't know what to do...
string: 我......我的父母不久前去世了。我......我不知道該怎麼辦才好......

original: My pa died, and... and now I'm all alone.
string: 我爸死了，而現在......只剩我一個人了。

original: My ma died, and... and I don't know what to do...
string: 我媽死了......現在我不知道該怎麼辦......

original: Really? Do you... do you have a place I could live?
string: 真的嗎？你......你真的有地方給我住？

original: Oh, wow! Are you... are you sure? You really wouldn't mind?
string: 喔，哇！你......你確定嗎？你真的願意？
......喔，好吧。我想我還是該謝你一聲......
......喔，好吧。我想我還是得說聲謝謝。

original: Yea! Thanks, Mama! I promise, I'll be the best daughter ever!
string: 好呀！謝謝，媽媽！我發誓，我一定會當個最好的女兒！

original: Yea! Thanks, mister- um, Papa! I promise, I'll be the best daughter ever!
string: 好呀！謝謝你，先......嗯，我是說爸爸！我發誓一定會當個最好的女兒！

original: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Ma! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!
string: 真的嗎？妳是認真的？哇！謝啦，老媽！我發誓，我不會給妳添麻煩的。

original: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Pa! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!
string: 真的嗎？你是認真的？哇！謝啦，老爸！我發誓，我不會惹麻煩的。

original: I could adopt you, if you want.
string: 你願意的話，我可以領養你。

original: Really? Are you... are you sure?
Yes, I've got a big house in Solitude.
string: 是啊，我在獨孤城有間大房子。

original: Yes, I've got a big house in Windhelm.
string: 是啊，我在風舵城有間大房子。

original: Yes, I've got a house in Riften.
string: 是啊，我在裂谷城有間房子。

original: Yes, I've got a house in Whiterun.
string: 是啊，我在白漫有間房子。

original: Yes, I've got a house in Markarth.
string: 是啊，我在馬卡斯城有間房子。

original: Actually, maybe this isn't the best time...
string: 事實上，現在可能不是最好的時機......

original: A new home! Wow! I can't wait to see it!
string: 一個新家！哇！我等不及要親眼看看了！

original: I need to get my things and say goodbye to everyone. I'll meet you at home. Thanks! Thanks so much!
string: 我得收拾東西，並和大家告別。我們在家見吧。謝謝！非常感謝！

original: Just... just let me get my things and say goodbye to everyone. I'll meet you at home. Thanks! Thanks again!
string: 讓......讓我收拾東西並和大家告別吧。我們在家見了。再次謝謝你！

original: Wow! I can't wait to see my new home!
string: 哇！我等不及要看看新家了！

original: My mother and father brought me here a year ago. They said they'd be back soon, but... they're awfully late.
string: 我爸媽一年前把我帶來這裡。他們說很快就會來接我......但他們好慢。

original: I... I guess it would be all right if you want to adopt me. At least until my real parents get back.
string: 如果你想要領養我，我......我想應該沒問題。至少在我親生父母回來之前。

original: Name's Samuel. Never met my parents. Grelod said my mother worked here at the Orphanage, but she died when I was born.
string: 我叫薩穆埃爾。我從沒見過我爸媽。桂羅說我媽媽從前在這間孤兒院工作，但在我出生時去世了。

original: Constance and the others are nice enough, but I... I want to have a real family.
string: 康斯坦斯和其他人都很好，但我......我還是想要有個真正的家庭。

original: I'm Hroar. You know, like the sound the lion makes? That's what my mother used to say.
string: 我叫赫洛阿。你知道嗎，我的聲音唸起來就像獅子發出的吼聲。以前我媽媽老是這麼說。

original: I want to be big and strong like a lion, too. Someday.
string: 總有一天，我也要像頭獅子般強大。

original: I've been the only girl here since forever. The boys pick on me, and they make me do all the chores.
string: 我一直都是這裡唯一的女孩子。那些男生都欺負我，把事情全推給我一個人做。

original: You want to adopt one of us, right? I'm strong, I'm fast, I'm smart, I can do anything better than them. Come on, pick me? Please?
string: 你要領養我們其中之一對吧？我很強壯、動作快，而且聰明。任何事情我都可以做得比他們更好。好嘛，拜託你選我嘛？

original: Could I adopt one of your children?
string: 我可以領養一位妳這裡的孩子嗎？

original: I'm sorry, no. Grelod is the headmistress here, and she's decided not to allow any adoptions right now.
string: 抱歉，不行。桂羅是這裡的院長，而她決定目前不准許任何人來領養孩子。

original: I... I wish things were otherwise. All of these children deserve a better home. But there's nothing I can do.
string: 我......我也希望事情不像這樣。這些孩子們都應該有個更好的家。不過我無能為力。

original: Why yes, yes of course! What a wonderful surprise!
string: 為什麼不，當然好！真是個美好的驚喜！

original: Very well, let's try this again...
You already have children, don't you? I'm sorry, but I can't let you adopt anyone else.
string: 你已經有孩子了吧？抱歉，我不能再讓你領養別的孩子了。

original: Pick one of the others. I'll be fine.
Are you really gonna adopt one of us?
string: 你真的要領養我們其中之一嗎？

original: You're here to adopt someone? Really? Oh, wow!
string: 你是來領養小孩的？真的？喔，哇！

original: This war has created so many orphans, and so few are willing to open their hearts to them...
string: 這場戰爭創造了太多孤兒了，而一般人之中又鮮少有人願意對他們敞開心扉......

original: First, I'll need to ask you a few questions.
string: 首先，我得問你幾個問題。

original: What do I need to do?
What do you do for a living?
What? If you aren't going to be...
string: 什麼？如果你不是在和我開......

original: ...wait. Shor, you're serious! Well, I... all right then.
string: ......等等。朔爾在上，你是認真的！嗯，我......好吧。

original: What? What kind of a joke is this?
Look, don't waste my time. Come back when you're ready to discuss this for real.
string: 聽好，別浪費我的時間。等你想要認真討論時，再回來找我。

original: ...Look, let's be realistic. You're an adventurer. It's not exactly a safe or reliable profession.
string: ......聽好，讓我們從現實面來看。你是個冒險者，而那並不是一個相當安全可靠的職業。

original: I need to be sure your child will have a safe, stable home to grow up in.
string: 我必須確定你的孩子是否能在一個安全且穩定的家庭中成長。

original: Show me that you can support a child. Buy a house. Furnish it. Then come back, and we'll talk.
string: 證明你可以養得起孩子給我看。買間房子，裝修一下，然後再來找我談。

original: I'm Arch-Mage of the College of Winterhold.
string: 我是冬堡學院的首席法師。

original: Where will your child be living?
string: 你的孩子將會住在哪裡？
住在我位於獨孤城的房子。
住在我位於風舵城的房子。
住在我位於馬卡斯城的房子。
住在我位於裂谷城的房子。
住在我位於白漫的房子。

original: That's all I need from you. Congratulations! I think you'll make an excellent parent.
string: 我只需要問這些。恭喜！我想你應該能勝任為人父母的角色。

original: Go meet the children and decide who you'd like to adopt.
string: 去見見孩子們，決定你想領養哪一個。

original: Once you've made a decision, I'll collect their things and be sure they make it over to your house.
string: 當你決定好了，我會幫他收拾東西，並確保他能抵達你家。

original: I'm sorry, but until you own a home with a room for your children, I can't allow you to adopt anyone.
string: 抱歉，但在你擁有一間房子，並且有房間給孩子住之前，我沒辦法准許你領養任何一個孩子。

original: Yes, of course! That's wonderful news!
string: 好啊，當然！真是個好消息！

original: I've purchased a home and furnished it. Can I adopt a child now?
string: 我購買且裝修了一間房子。現在我可以領養小孩了嗎？

original: Go on, speak to the children! I'm sure they're eager to meet you.
string: 去吧，去和孩子們聊聊！我相信他們一定迫不及待想要見你了。

original: Congratulations. I hope you have a wonderful life together.
string: 恭喜。我希望你們能一起享受美好的人生。

original: I have a house, but not room for you.
string: 我有間房子，但是沒有你能住的房間。

original: Yes, I've got a house in Falkreath.
string: 我在佛克瑞斯有間房子。

original: Yes, I've got a house in Hjaalmarch.
string: 我在希雅陲領有間房子。

original: Yes, I've got a house in the Pale.

string: 在我位於佛克瑞斯的房子。
在我位於希雅陲領的房子。

original: At my house in the Pale.
string: 在我位於蒼原領的房子。

original: Replace my Alchemy Lab with a Child's Room. (<Global=HDMarkarthChildRoom> gold)
string: 用兒童臥室取代我的鍊金實驗室。（<Global=HDMarkarthChildRoom>金幣）

original: Replace my Enchanting Lab with a Child's Room. (<Global=HDRiftenChildRoom> gold)
string: 用兒童臥室取代我的附魔實驗室。（<Global=HDRiftenChildRoom>金幣）

original: Replace my Alchemy Lab with a Child's Room. (<Global=HDWhiterunChildRoom> gold)
string: 用兒童臥室取代我的鍊金實驗室。（<Global=HDWhiterunChildRoom>金幣）

original: Constance takes good care of us. But... I still want a real home. A real family.
string: 康斯坦斯把我們照顧得很好。但我......我還是想要有個真正的家庭。

original: It's not too bad here. But... I still miss my parents.
string: 這裡還不壞，但是......我還是想念我爸媽。

original: I hate it here. I... I wanna go home.
string: 我討厭這裡。我......我想回家。

original: Are you... are you going to adopt one of us?
string: 你......你打算領養我們之中的一個嗎？

original: What... what am I going to do?
I... hadn't thought of that. I own a house, but I don't have a room for them.
string: 我......還沒想到。我有間房子，但沒有房間給他們住。

original: I... hadn't thought of that. I own a house, but I don't have a room for them.
string: 我......還沒想到。我有間房子，但沒有房間給他們住。

original: Congratulations! If you ever want to adopt another child, you'll always be welcome here.
string: 恭喜！如果你還想再領養一個孩子，隨時歡迎再來。

original: What have you got for sale?
string: 你有什麼東西可以賣給我？

original: Some pretty flowers. I picked them all by myself!
string: 一些美麗的花朵。我自己摘的！

original: Hi Mister! Would you like to buy some flowers? Please?
string: 你好，先生！你想買點花嗎？拜託？

original: Hi Lady! Would you like to buy some flowers? Please?
string: 你好，女士！你想買點花嗎？拜託？

original: Not much. But I hope you like them!
string: 不多，但我希望你喜歡它們！

original: They... they're dead. My mama died when I was little. I... I don't remember her very well.
string: 他們......他們死了。我媽媽在我小時候去世的。我......我不太記得她了。

original: My father was a Stormcloak soldier. One day, he left and... didn't come back.
string: 我爸爸是一位風暴斗篷士兵。有一天，他離開之後......就沒有再回來過了。

original: I'm all alone. I... I try to sell flowers so I can buy food. It's not much but... what else can I do?
string: 我現在是孤單一人了。我......我試著賣花維生。收入不多，可是......不然我還能做什麼？

original: Who are you? Where are your parents?
Both my parents were in the Legion. There was... an ambush.
string: 我的雙親都是帝國軍團士兵。他們遇到......一次突襲。

original: Katla said she'd feed me if I could make myself useful. I take care of the animals, run errands, that kind of thing.
string: 凱特拉說她養我是為了要我幫忙幹活。我幫忙照顧動物、跑跑腿之類的。

original: I guess it could be worse. But... I'm sick of sleeping outside with the horses. I want a real home, real parents. Not... this.
string: 我猜情況有可能變得比現在更糟。但是......我已經受夠跟馬一起睡了。我想要一個真正的家、真正的雙親，而不是......這樣。

original: Who are you? Where are your parents?
Who are you? Where are your parents?
Please, won't you buy a flower?
string: 拜託，可以幫忙買些花嗎？

original: No one bought any flowers again today. I... I don't know what to do.
string: 今天沒有人跟我買花。我......我不知道該怎麼辦才好。

original: Mister, could you spare a coin?
string: 先生，可以施捨一枚金幣嗎？

original: Lady, could you spare a coin?
string: 女士，可以施捨一枚金幣嗎？

original: Talk to Geimund if you want a horse, or Katla if you're looking for work. I can't help you.
string: 想要馬的話，就去找蓋伊姆德談。要工作就找凱特拉。我幫不了你。

original: I take care of the horses. And the goats. And the chickens. And the garden.
string: 我負責照料這些馬，還有山羊。還有那些雞隻......還有花園。

original: You probably want someone else. I'm just the stable boy.
string: 你可能得去找其他人。我只是個看管馬廄的。

original: Thanks... thanks for talking to me.
My pa was a sailor. Took me with him on his last trip. After he got sick, they... put us off here and left without us.
string: 我爸從前是個水手。在他最後一次航海時，他還帶我一起去呢。後來他生病之後，他們......就把我們丟在這，自己離開了。

original: He... died a few days later. I've tried to make do since then, but... it's been hard. Real hard.
string: 他......幾天後就死了。之後我試著要討生活，可是......沒有那麼容易。真的很不容易。

original: Lakeview Manor, my house in Falkreath.
string: 我在佛克瑞斯領的房子，湖景莊園。

original: Windstad Manor, my house in Hjaalmarch.
string: 我在希雅陲領的房子，風城莊園。

original: Heljarchen Hall, my house in the Pale.
string: 我在蒼原領的房子，赫雅根大廳。

original: How about my house in Falkreath?
string: 我在佛克瑞斯領的房子如何？

original: We could live in my house in Hjaalmarch.
string: 我們可以住我在希雅陲領的房子。

original: I have a house in the Pale.
This is the happiest day of my life. Where should we live? My home is your home now, of course.
string: 這是我一生中最快樂的時候了。我們住哪兒？當然，我家也會是你家了。

original: We're married. I guess we'll need to decide where we're living, won't we? You can always stay with me.
string: 我們已經結婚了。我想是時候決定我們要住在哪裡了，對吧？你可以一輩子都跟我在一起的。

original: I guess we have our entire lives together, now. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
string: 我想我們一輩子都要在一起了。我們住在哪裡好？你可以一直待在我身邊......

original: We face the world together now. Where should we live? My home is yours.
string: 我們現在要一起過日子了。我們住在哪裡好呢？我家現在也是你家了。

original: Married. It doesn't feel like I thought it would, but I'm happy. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
string: 結婚了。這與我想像的不大一樣，但還是很高興。我們住哪呢？你可以跟我一起住......。

original: We should find a place with room for your kids, though.
string: 不過，我們得找個有房間給你的孩子住的地方才行。

original: Oh, but... you have children, don't you? We'll have to find somewhere with room for them.
string: 喔，但是......你有孩子不是嗎？我們得找個有房間給孩子住的地方才行。

original: You have children, though, don't you? We'll have to find somewhere with room for them, too.
string: 不過，你有孩子對吧？我們找的地方還得有房間給他們住才行。

original: But you have kids, right? We should find a home where we can live together.
string: 但是有孩子對吧？我們得找個能供我們一起住的房子。

original: Lakeview Manor, my house in Falkreath.
string: 去湖景莊園，我在佛克瑞斯領的房子。

original: Windstad Manor, my house in Hjaalmarch.
string: 去風城莊園，我在希雅陲領的房子。

original: Heljarchen Hall, my house in the Pale.
string: 去赫雅根大廳，我在蒼原領的房子。

original: I'm running food and supplies to the miners.
string: 我在把食物和補給品運去給礦工們。

original: Don't pay much, but they let me sleep by the fire in the inn most nights.
string: 雖然酬勞不多，但至少他們讓我大多數的晚上都能睡在客棧的爐火邊。

original: It's... it's what Brenuin said I should do. He's the only one that's been nice to me since... since mama...
string: 是......是布瑞紐恩建議我這麼做的。他是唯一一個對我好過的人，自從......自從媽媽她......

original: ...since she died. My aunt and uncle took over our farm and threw me out. Said I wasn't good for anything.
string: ......自從她去世之後。我叔叔和阿姨接管了農場，並將我掃地出門。他們說我一點用都沒有。

original: I wound up here, but... I... I don't know what to do. I miss her so much...
string: 我流浪到了這裡，但是......我不知道該怎麼辦才好。我好想念她......

original: I hate it. Everyone feels sorry for me, so they don't treat me too bad, but...
string: 我恨透它了。這裡每個人都覺得我很可憐，所以對我還不壞。可是......

original: How do you like the farm?

string: 可以再告訴我一次你的故事嗎？

original: Hey, Pa! You want to play a game with us?
string: 嘿，爸！要和我們一起玩個遊戲嗎？

original: Hey, Ma! Want to play a game with us?
string: 嘿，媽！要和我們一起玩個遊戲嗎？

original: Hey, Pa! You want to play a game with us?
string: 嘿，爸！要和我們一起玩個遊戲嗎？

original: Hey, Ma! Want to play a game with us?
string: 嘿，媽！要和我們一起玩個遊戲嗎？

original: Papa! We're playing a game. Do you want to play?
string: 爸！我們正在玩遊戲。你要玩嗎？

original: Mama! We're playing a game. Do you want to play?
string: 媽！我們正在玩遊戲。你要玩嗎？

original: I'd be honored to be your steward. You've built a fine steading here.
string: 我很榮幸能擔任你的管家。你在此地建立了一座出色的家園。

original: I'll see to it at once.
Certainly. I'll have it delivered to the chest near your workbenches.
string: 沒問題。我會把東西送去你工作台旁的箱子裡。

original: Hmm. You might try Gray Pine Goods in Falkreath. They carry all sorts of things like that.
string: 嗯，你可以去佛克瑞斯的灰松木雜貨店試試。凡是那一類的東西他們都有賣。

original: Bits and Pieces in Solitude is probably the place to start. They sell all sorts of things like that.
string: 你可以從獨孤城那家「零珠碎玉」開始找起。那一類的東西他們都有賣。

original: You know Belethor's shop in Whiterun? That'd be a good place to start. He carries all sorts of things like that.
string: 你知道白漫的貝萊托爾的雜貨鋪嗎？你可以從那裡開始找起。那一類的東西他都有賣。

original: I'll keep an eye out for a good cow to purchase.
string: 我會仔細挑一頭上好的乳牛買下的。

original: Yes? Did you change your mind?
Very good, I'll make all the arrangements.
I'm sorry, but you can't afford that right now.
string: 我很抱歉，但你現在無法購買。

original: I think you'll want a stable before we spend good coin on a horse.
string: 我想在花一大筆錢買馬之前，你會先需要一座馬廄。

original: You'll need to build a pen for it first.
Very good. I'll see about hiring a carriage driver at once.
string: 好的。我馬上設法雇一位馬車伕。

original: It would be pleasant to have some music in the house. I'll make inquiries about retaining the services of a bard.
string: 家裡若能有些音樂會讓人心曠神怡。我會去找找哪裡能雇來一位吟遊詩人。

original: Ah, good. There's one I've had my eye on. I'll see if it's still for sale.
string: 啊，很好。之前我已經有在留意其中一匹，我會去看看牠是不是還有在賣。

original: Certainly. What did you have in mind?
Of course. What are we running short of?
Is there anything else you need?
Ah. Unfortunately, I'm afraid you're a bit short of funds at the moment.
string: 啊。很不幸的，你現在恐怕還缺少一些資金。

original: Doing some building, eh? We can deliver it wherever you need.
string: 在蓋房子嗎？你需要什麼我們都能幫忙送去。

original: When you've actually got the coin, we can do business.
string: 等你有錢在手邊時，我們就能坐下來談生意了。

original: I'll have them hauled over right away.
Sure thing, friend. I can use a break anyway.
string: 當然沒問題，朋友。我隨時都可以休假。

original: Sure thing, friend. I'll even have it delivered to your building site, no charge.
string: 當然沒問題，朋友。我還可以讓人直接把它送到你的工地現場，完全免費。

original: I can't just give away good timber.
string: 我可不能白白把上好的原木送人啊。

original: Of course. What room would you like me to furnish?
string: 當然了。你想要我裝修什麼樣的房間？

original: Did you get me a present?

string: 是不是已經過了你該上床睡覺的時間了？

original: Make it stop! Please, make it stop!
string: 讓它停下來！請讓它停下來！

original: I... I'll be all right. Please, just... just make it stop!
string: 我......我會沒事的。請......請讓它停下來！
我不需要任何其他的東西了。

original: I'd like you to buy some building materials for me.
string: 我想要請你幫我買些建築材料。

original: I'd like you to buy furnishings for the house.
string: 我想請你幫房子購買裝修物件。

original: I'll have to think about it.
Let me know if you change your mind.
string: 如果改變主意的話，請通知我。

original: I'm a bit short of money right now. (<Global=BYOHHPCost> gold)
string: 我現在有點缺錢。（<Global=BYOHHPCost>枚金幣）

original: Well, that's your business. Was there anything else you needed?
string: 嗯，那是你的事。你還有需要什麼其他的嗎？

original: Excellent. Then I grant you a title to the land.
string: 很好。那我把土地權狀給你。

original: Excellent. We're glad to have you as a landowner in Hjaalmarch. Here's the title to your steading.
string: 很好。很高興你能成為希雅陲領的地主。這裡是你的土地權狀。

original: If you don't mind getting your feet wet, your best bet is to head north past the mill. The odd tomb or two along the way won't bother you.
string: 如果你不介意把腳弄濕，那最好的選擇是往北走，穿過鋸木廠。路邊那一兩座奇怪的古墓對你來說不算什麼的。

original: The land is on the coast, across the Karth delta from Solitude. An inspiring location, as you'll see.
string: 那塊土地位於岸邊，就在從獨孤城流過來的卡斯河沖刷成的三角洲上。一個讓人看了精神為之一振的地點——你會懂我的意思的。

original: I'd like to purchase a house.
I got your letter about the land for sale. Is it still available?
string: 我收到你那封關於有土地出售的信了。它還有在賣嗎？

original: No, I'm afraid not. But there is land if you want to buy it.
string: 不，我想恐怕沒辦法賣你。不過如果你想買的話，倒是有塊土地可賣。

original: Is that land you mentioned still available?
string: 你之前提到的土地還在賣嗎？

original: Yes, it is. The Jarl thought of you when it came up for sale.
string: 是啊。當決定要賣了那塊地時，領主第一個就想到你。

original: It's on the north coast of Hjaalmarch, with a magnificent view of Solitude on its crag. Just the place for a new manor house.
string: 土地在希雅陲領的北岸，有著壯觀的景色，可以看見矗立在峭壁上的獨孤城。恰好適合用來建設一座新的莊園。

original: I got your letter about the land for sale. Is it still available?
string: 我收到你那封關於有土地出售的信了。它還在賣嗎？

original: There aren't any houses for sale in Morthal. But if you're interested, I could sell you land in the hold where you could build your own house.
string: 墨索爾城恐怕沒有任何房子出售。不過，如果你有興趣的話，我可以把領地內的一塊土地賣給你，讓你蓋棟屬於自己的房子。

original: Yes. It's on the north coast of Hjaalmarch, with a magnificent view of Solitude on its crag. Just the place for a new manor house.
string: 是的。土地在希雅陲領的北岸，有著壯觀的景色，可以看見矗立在峭壁上的獨孤城。恰好適合用來建設一座新的莊園。

original: Is that land you mentioned still available?
string: 你之前提到的土地還在賣嗎？

original: Do you know where I can buy materials like glass or straw?
string: 你知道我哪裡能買到像玻璃或麥桿這類的材料嗎？

original: I think we may have a problem in the basement. Been hearing a lot of scurrying down there lately.
string: 我想我們在地下室可能有些麻煩了。最近老是聽到有東西在下面亂竄。
絕對不行。不准養寵物。永遠。

original: No. Now get it out of here.
string: 不行。現在就把牠帶出去。

original: All right. But you're responsible for him.
string: 好吧，但你得負起責任照顧牠。

original: I'll never speak to you again!
string: 我再也不會跟你說話了！

original: Why... why did you do that?
string: 為什麼......你為什麼那麼做？

original: Sure. When I don't need him, he can stay with you.
string: 當然。當我不需要牠的時候，牠可以陪著你。
謝謝。謝謝你......為我做的一切，爸。
謝謝。謝謝妳......為我做的一切，媽。

original: I have a family again. I... I can't thank you enough.
string: 我又有自己的家庭了。我......我不知道該怎麼感謝你。

original: This is more than I ever could have hoped for. Thanks. Thanks so much.
string: 這一切比我所期望的都還要多。謝謝。非常謝謝你。
謝謝。謝謝你......為我做的這一切。

original: I... I know it's not much, but... I've found a few little things. I've put them in the chest in my room.
string: 我......我知道那不多，但......我找出了一些小東西。我把它們放在我房間的箱子裡。

original: If you see anything you want, take it. You've done so much for me... it's the least I can do.
string: 如果你看見什麼想要的，就拿去吧。你為我做得太多了......這是我唯一能做的。

original: I... I know it's not much, but... I've found a few pretty things. They're in the chest in my room.
string: 我......我知道那不多，但......我找出了一些小東西。就在我房間的箱子裡。

original: If you see anything you like, please, take it! You've done so much for me. It's... it's the least I can do.
string: 如果你看見什麼想要的，就拿去吧。你為我做得太多了......這是我唯一能做的。

original: This is... this is great! It's everything I could have asked for!
string: 這......這太棒了！這是我夢寐以求的一切！

original: It's... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 這是我夢寐以求的一切。

original: A real home. A real family. I almost can't believe it.
string: 一個真正的家。真正的家人。我簡直難以相信這是真的。

original: I... I have a home again. A family. I almost can't believe it.
string: 我......我又有家了。我簡直難以相信。

original: Is... is that your pet, Mama? He looks really scary!
string: 那......那是妳的寵物嗎，媽媽？牠看起來好嚇人！

original: Is... is that your pet, Papa? He looks really scary!
string: 那......那是你的寵物嗎，爸爸？牠看起來好嚇人！

original: Is... is that your pet? Really? Wow, he looks tough!
string: 那......那是你的寵物嗎？哇！牠看起來真不好惹！

original: A doggy! Papa, I didn't know you had a doggy! He's so cute...
string: 一隻小狗！爸爸，我不知道你還養了一隻狗呢！牠好可愛......

original: A doggy! Mama, I didn't know you had a doggy! He's so cute...
string: 一隻小狗！媽媽，我不知道妳還養了一隻狗呢！牠好可愛......

original: A dog! Wow, I didn't know you had a dog!
string: 一隻狗！哇！我不知道你還養了一隻狗呢！

original: A pet! Wow, I didn't know you had a pet!
string: 一隻寵物！哇！我不知道你還有養寵物呢！

original: Look, Papa! I made a new friend!
string: 看！爸爸！我交了個新朋友！

original: Look, Mama! I have a new friend!
string: 看！媽媽！我交了個新朋友！

original: Pa! Look what followed me home!
Ma! Look what followed me home!
Well... I heard there's a really nice tailor's in Solitude. And... and maybe the Khajiit sell dolls? They always have the best toys.
string: 這......我聽說獨孤城有個高明的裁縫。此外......也許虎人會賣玩偶吧？他們總是有最好的玩具出售。

original: I'm sure the Khajiit would have one- their toys are the best!
string: 我想虎人們會有——他們的玩具是最棒的！

original: For clothes... there's a tailor's shop in Solitude. I'm sure they'd have lots to choose from.
string: 關於衣服嘛......獨孤城有間裁縫店。我想他們一定有很多品項可供挑選。

original: I'd... I'd really like a dolly. Or maybe a pretty new dress?
string: 我......我真的很想要個娃娃。或是漂亮的新洋裝？

original: Well, sweets are always good. Or a new outfit. Or... or maybe a wooden sword? All my friends have swords.
string: 嗯，甜點永遠歡迎。或是買一件新衣服，或者......一把木劍？我每個朋友都有一把耶。

original: Is it time to move out?
Yes, my Thane? Do you need something?
string: 是的，武衛？你需要什麼嗎？

original: You know what? I like you. You're not afraid to get your hands dirty.
string: 你知道嗎？我欣賞你。你不怕弄髒自己的手。

original: I hereby grant you permission to purchase property in Falkreath hold. Talk to my steward if you're interested.
string: 我在此賦予你在佛克瑞斯領購置土地的權利。如果你有興趣，就去找我的總管談吧。

original: Grr... I'm gonna get you for that!
Oh yeah? Well, I've seen mudcrabs that're smarter than you!
string: 是嗎？我所見過的泥沼蟹都比你聰明！
你的耳朵跟精靈一樣怪！
你嘴巴臭得跟諾德亡靈一樣！
你的鼻子就像長毛象一樣！

original: Well, you smell like a Hagraven. And you look like one, too!
string: 嗯，你聞起來就像烏鴉鬼婆一樣。而且你長得也像！

original: I'll have to think about it.
Hm. Well, if you change your mind, come see me again.
string: 嗯，好吧，你要是改變主意了，就再來找我。

original: Hmph. Suit yourself. I can't promise someone else won't buy it in the meantime, though.
string: 哼，隨便你。不過，我可不能保證這段期間內其他人不會把地買走。

original: I'm a bit short of money right now. (<Global=BYOHHPCost> gold)
That's unfortunate. Maybe I misjudged you.
string: 那真糟糕。也許我錯看你了。

original: Then by my right as Jarl, I grant you a title to the land.
string: 那麼，以我身為領主的權限，我賦予你那塊土地的所有權。

original: Wonderful. I'll sleep better knowing you're watching the southern marches. Here's the title to your steading.
string: 好極了。知道有你在幫我看著南方邊防，讓我可以睡得更安穩些。這是你的土地權狀。

original: Just follow the road south from Dawnstar, past Fort Dunstad, then head south.
string: 從晨星鎮順著路往南，通過丹斯塔德堡壘後，再繼續往南。

original: The land is near Giants' Gap, right on the border with Whiterun Hold. You'll almost be in sight of the Loreius Farm, in fact.
string: 那片土地位於巨人裂隙附近，就在和白漫領的邊界上。事實上，從羅瑞尤斯農場幾乎就可以望見你家。

original: I'd like to purchase a house.
No, I'm sorry. But there is land, available to you for purchase.
string: 抱歉，恐怕不行。不過土地的話倒是有一塊，想要的話可以賣給你。

original: Is that land you mentioned still available?
string: 你之前提的那塊土地還在賣嗎？

original: Land? Ah, yes. The Heljarchen estate. I thought of you immediately when it became available.
string: 土地？啊，是的，就是赫雅根那塊土地。當決定要出售它時，我馬上就想到了你。

original: It's in the south of the Pale, near Giants' Gap. Just the spot for someone like you to establish a steading.
string: 那片土地在蒼原領的南邊，就在巨人裂隙附近。恰好是像你這樣的人會想要建立家園的地點。

original: I got your letter about the land for sale. Is it still available?
string: 我收到你寄的那封有關出售土地的信了。它還在賣嗎？

original: Sorry, no houses for sale in Dawnstar right now. But... I could sell you land in the hold where you could build your own house.
string: 抱歉，晨星鎮現在沒有房子可以出售。不過......我可以把領地內的一片土地賣給你，這樣你就能在那蓋自己的房子了。

original: Yes, it is. It's in the southern part of the Pale, right on the border with Whiterun Hold. All the room in the world to build your own house.
string: 是的，仍在待價而沽。那塊地就在蒼原領的南端，剛好位於和白漫領的邊界上。那裡所有的空間都可以供你用來蓋房子。

original: Is that land you mentioned still available?
string: 你之前提的那塊土地還在賣嗎？

original: I got your letter about the land for sale. Is it still available?
string: 我收到你寄的那封有關出售土地的信了。它還在賣嗎？

original: You're a connoisseur, indeed. Not many appreciate the subtle beauty of the flute.
string: 你是個內行的。很少人能欣賞長笛的低調之美。

original: Sit back and enjoy some classical drumming.
string: 好好坐下，享受一下經典的鼓聲吧。

original: The most elegant of instruments. The pinnacle of the bardic art.
string: 最優雅的樂器。這是詩人技藝中的精華部分。

original: I'd like you to play a different instrument.
string: 我想要你演奏另一種樂器。

original: Certainly. I am trained in the three traditional bardic instruments: lute, drum, and flute. Which would you prefer?
string: 沒問題。我受過三種傳統吟遊詩人樂器的訓練——魯特琴、鼓、還有長笛。你想要聽哪一種？

original: I don't need your services any more.
string: 我不再需要你為我服務了。

original: I'm sorry to hear that. It was my honor to have you as a patron. Please let your steward know if you want to hire me again.
string: 聽你這麼說我很遺憾。能夠接受你的資助，我很榮幸。如果你想再次雇用我，請和你的管家說。

original: Your wish is my command, as always.
string: 一如往常，你吩咐，我照辦。

original: I'd like to make a request.
Cut it out, both of you.
string: 你們兩個，都給我停下來。

original: Allow me to introduce myself. I am the bard Llewellyn, known as "The Nightingale". Your steward has arranged for me to take service with you.
string: 容我自我介紹。我是吟遊詩人盧埃林，人稱「夜鶯」。你的管家安排我來為你服務。

original: Good day to you. I am Sonir, the bard that your steward has hired. Please let me know if there's anything specific you want to hear.
string: 你好，我是梭妮雅，是你的管家雇來的吟遊詩人。如果你想聽什麼特定的曲子，請和我說。

original: Hello, my name is Oriella, the bard that you asked your steward to hire. I hope my music will be pleasing to you.
string: 你好，我的名字叫奧莉耶拉，是你讓管家雇我來的。希望我的音樂能夠取悅你。

original: Oh. Well then, I'd best be on my way.
string: 喔。好吧，我最好趕緊上路去。

original: I've changed my mind. I'd like you to stay.
string: 我改變主意了，我希望你能留下。

original: Ah, excellent! We'll just call this a misunderstanding between friends. I've already forgotten it, myself.
string: 啊，好極了！我們就把這當成朋友間的誤會一場吧。至於我呢，已經忘了這件事了。

original: As you wish. We can consider this incident nothing more than an unfortunate misunderstanding.
string: 如你所願。我們就把這起偶然當作一場不幸的誤會吧。

original: Good! I knew you couldn't have been serious when you dismissed me. Life without music is hardly worth living, is it?
string: 很好！我就知道你要我走的時候不是認真的。生命裡沒有音樂，那還有什麼好活的呢？對吧？
輪到你了！把人找出來吧。

original: Read the bandit's ransom note for <Alias=Spouse>
string: 閱讀強盜送來的關於<Alias=Spouse>的贖金通知

original: Speak to the Jarl of Dawnstar about the land for sale
string: 和晨星鎮的領主談談關於土地出售一事

original: Visit your new property in <Alias=Hold> hold
Use the Drafting Table to begin building your house
string: 使用設計桌開始建造你的家

original: Use the Carpenter's Workbench to build the foundation of your house
string: 使用木匠的工作台來建造你家的地基

original: Speak to the Steward of Morthal about the land for sale
string: 和墨索爾城的總管談談關於土地出售一事

original: Visit your new property in <Alias=Hold> hold
Use the Drafting Table to begin building your house
string: 使用設計桌開始建造你的家

original: Use the Carpenter's Workbench to build the foundation of your house
string: 使用木匠的工作台來建造你家的地基

original: Visit Proudspire Manor, your new house
string: 進入你的新家——豪塔別墅。

original: Visit Vlindrel Hall, your new house
string: 進入你的新家——林德爾會堂。

original: Speak with Constance Michel about Adoption
string: 和康斯坦斯．米切爾討論領養事宜

original: Speak to the Jarl of Falkreath
Speak to the Steward of Falkreath about the land for sale
string: 與佛克瑞斯領主的總管討論關於土地出售的事宜

original: Visit your new property in <Alias=Hold> hold
Use the Drafting Table to begin building your house
string: 使用設計桌開始建造你的家

original: Use the Carpenter's Workbench to build the foundation of your house
string: 使用木匠的工作台來建造你家的地基

original: Buy lumber for building your house
string: 購買木材以建造你的家

original: You can find, make, or buy a variety of gifts for your children, including toys, clothing, and sweets.
string: 你可以找到、製造或購買各種禮物給你的孩子，種類包括玩具、衣服和甜點。

original: If you would like to adopt an orphan from the Orphanage, speak to Constance Michel.
string: 如果你想從孤兒院中領養孤兒，就去找康斯坦斯．米切爾談。

original: You can adopt up to two children, if you own a home with room for them to stay in.
string: 如果你的家中有足夠的房間，便能領養最多兩個孩子。

original: Friends of the Jarls in Falkreath, Hjaalmarch and the Pale may buy land in those holds and build their own home on it.
string: 和佛克瑞斯、希雅陲以及蒼原領的領主為友，可以向他們購買土地以在上面建築自己的家。

original: Location for things that need a location
string: 給需要場所的東西用的場所

original: You awaken feeling a surge of Vampiric power.
string: 你醒來時感受到吸血鬼之力在全身流竄

original: You only need to add one of each item to the hatchery.
string: 每種物品只需各放一份至魚塭中

original: Only one item at a time can be planted.
string: 同一時間只能種植一樣物品

original: There is already something growing here. What would you like to do?
string: 此處已有作物。你打算怎麼做？

original: You awaken feeling a Father's Love.
string: 你醒來時感受到身為父親的慈愛

original: You awaken feeling a Mother's Love.
string: 你醒來時感受到身為母親的慈愛
